You are also overwhelmed by the smell, which was an odd combination of foot sweat and strawberries, which must have been from a detergent that she used. Once her foot gets past the long section of the sock, you can see her incredibly huge toes emerge and barrel towards you. You brace yourself for the impact, and you are knocked into the wall of the sock by her 2nd toe, and it pins you completely for a few tense moments. You somehow are able to free yourself, and you take that chance to wedge yourself in-between her smaller toes, specifically her 3rd and 4th toes. The smell is just as strong as before, and the toes already started to sweat a bit. But she was right about the company part, because each toe looked like those full-body pillows you’d see online, except it was a very small extension of a human being. You decide to wait until Becca stops moving, and you remain still as she puts her legs under the covers and gets ready to sleep. You wait a few more minutes before getting comfortable, until you have a good feeling that Becca fell asleep, and then you squeeze a bit closer to those two toes and cuddle against the smaller 4th toe. You didn’t exactly like feet or anything, but you figure that you should make the best of the situation, and you weren’t really disliking any of this either, so you were keeping an open mind.


As you hugged Becca’s 4th toe, in an attempt to get more comfortable and be ready to sleep, it stirred an unconscious reaction out of her. She started to wiggle her toes, thinking that something was giving her an itch between her toes, and you are harshly smothered by her massive and oppressive toe flesh. But she gives up before long, so you just readjust yourself before going to sleep too. You were glad that her feet seemed to let up on their sweating as she slept, so you wouldn’t be bothered by that at all. Both of you slept soundly through the night, although it could be easily argued that she had the better night sleep. Because it seemed that Becca’s unconscious mind still perceived you as an itch and foreign invader, and she would use her toes to torment you periodically. She would squeeze her toes, enveloping you in her soft and pudgy flesh. She would rub her feet together, causing your whole world to shake and quake, giving you a severe sense of motion sickness. And she would also wiggle her toes in her sleep, as her toes seemed to take a liking to your small and bug sized body, and they would use you for their pleasure regardless of the time of night. But, you still found time to sleep during all of the ‘loving’ attention Becca’s toes gave you, and eventually morning came. And you woke up first, but you realized that you were now completely stuck in-between Becca’s toes, and you were so tightly crammed into her toe flesh that you couldn’t even move enough to remind her of your presence. So you could only hope that Becca didn’t forget about you over her night’s sleep. About an hour later, where your face was deeply pressed into her slightly sweaty and smelly toe flesh, Becca finally woke up.


Becca lazily moved her legs, and planted both feet onto the floor, causing her toe flesh to expand over you and force you even deeper into them. Then she groggily walked over to the bathroom to freshen up before the day, making sure to brush her teeth, wash her face, and brush her hair. And then she started to get dressed, choosing a nice pair of black jeans and a red and blue checkered plaid shirt, along with a solid gray shirt underneath. She looked down at her socks, and really didn’t feel like changing them, and simply put on her favorite pair of ugg boots for today. In fact, this pair of uggs was an old one of Becca’s, which she used to wear back in her later years of high school. This pair was a size 9, and by this point in college, Becca’s feet grew to a decent size 10. Her feet weren’t big by any stretch, but these boots were definitely tight for her feet currently, but Becca just couldn’t stop wearing this particular pair.


Once they were all the way on, the heat level increased significantly for you, and her toe started to exude a whole lot more sweat. And because of the size, her foot was squished into the soft and fluffy cotton material, which also caused her toes to press even closer together, treating you to an even more personal experience within her green sock. You have a very bad feeling that Becca completely forgot about you, and you figure that there was nothing in her apartment to remind her about you. You think that it might have been a mistake to completely trust a person you just met, but you remain optimistic that she will remember you eventually. And with Becca standing, the pressure that both toes that you spent the night with increased severely, but you were surprised that you weren’t injured, let along still breathing. You reason that you must have become more durable now, but you don’t really want to test just how far it would take you, so you merely hope that Becca has a sudden realization about the guy she planned to help out.


After Becca was fully dressed and ready, she thought about her plan for the day. She thought out loud, saying “I’ve got a few classes today. This is my busy day after all. And I’ll need to stop by the book store to grab a textbook too. I might as well get to it!” And then she started walking towards her door, to start her day. But as she walked across the living room, she had a weird feeling suddenly; that kind of sinking feeling of dread, as if she forgot something really important. She mumbles, “Did I forget something? I don’t think so, but maybe…” As she mumbled and thought to herself, you were shouting in your personal toe trap “The thing you forgot is in-between your toes! His name is Ben! You went to his party last night, for crying out loud!!” Of course, Becca wouldn’t hear that, but did she remember her small new friend before she started her day? Or will Ben be stuck under and between her toes for a while longer?
1153223.title: Staying Out of the Way, at the Foot of her Bed

choices: Becca was coming to check on you, you were now 3 1/2 inchs tall
Becca's 16 year old sister, Sara, wanted the dollhouse back.  You were 4in.
Becca was checking on you but you shrank to 1/2 an inch tall and doesn't see you
115323.content:
Becca puts you down on her dresser and whispers "Okay, I'll be right back, don't move! I don't want to lose you." She turned to leave, and you hoped you wouldn't be alone long.

You examine the dresser. It has a mirror that you barely see yourself in, your head just happens to be above the border, but you know deep down that wont last long. You look over the edge and see a drawer partially opened. Looking closer you see that its her underwear drawer. Is that were she was going to let you sleep? Seems a little intimate for some you just met, and in your current situation.

Becca finally comes back, with a large pink dollhouse in her hands. You watch as she sets it on the ground next to her bed, then turns back to you.

"So, what do you think?" She says, pointing at the dollhouse. "It might still be a little big for you, you might only be child height compared to it." She says, coming closer to you, bending down so you are looking directly at her billboard sized face, but still giving you a view of her, now, mountainous breasts. Even at this size, she is still incredibly gorgeous. She lets out a giggle. "Awh, looks like someone is enjoying themselves." You look down and notice you are at full mast.

Embarrassed, you cover yourself up, causing her to giggle again. "Don't worry, little one, maybe later we can take care of that." She said with a smile. While you did like the sound of that, you didnt know exactly what she could do to "take care of it" as she said.

She places her hand next to you again, and you climb back on. She brings you over to the dollhouse, placing you down just in front of the door, which dwarfed you in size. You were just barely up to the door knob. Behind you, Becca lays down on the ground,causing the ground to shake beneath you. You turn around and see an amazing view of her cleavage, one you won't forget for a lifetime.

"Go on in, explore your new home!" She said excitedly. You reach for the door handle, and push it open. Walking in, she was right. You were about child height, everything even in this doll house was taller than you. Hoping you weren't going to get any smaller, you climb up the stairs to find the bed room, Becca watching you through the window as you climb the stairs.

She directs you to the bed room. Even the bed was taller than you. You barely managed to climb up, thankfully it had cloth sheets. You look out the window, seeing Becca's giant eye outside. It was eerie, but also comforting. You got lucky that she was willing to help you.

"Alright, tiny," She boomed from outside, "Goodnight, and sleep tight. I'll see you in the morning!" You watched as Becca stood up, her feet being the last thing you see of her.

Eventually, you drift off to sleep, hoping that when you wake up, maybe this would be over.

You wake up, a loud booming coming from outside...
115323.title: A small man in a small house in a giant house

choices: Try approaching Sara from the floor, as she is standing by the house on her cell
You decide to wait it out, trying to figure out more about Sara before you act
1153232.content:
Your eyes snapped open. It wasn't a dream, you had really heard those booming noises. What could they be? Oh, of course, footfalls. You were tiny. The events of last night comes flooding back into your memory to the rhythm of the footsteps. You clam yourself. It was just Becca, coming back to check on you. You briefly wonder how long you'd slept in. It seemed well into the day based on the sunlight streaming into your new miniature home. Sure, it was a bit embarrassing to be living in a damn dollhouse, but it beat being somewhere more exposed. Now, to ask Becca to call someone about growing you back to...

You are thrown from your bed as the house lurches, lifting off of the carpet in a swift, jerking motion. What was going on? If this was some kind of joke, you weren't laughing. The abrupt movement had sent you flying into the bedroom wall, rolling to a stop at the side of the doll bed.
"Becca, what the fuck! Stop shaking the house! Put me back down! This isn't funny, you could..." your voice trails off as you notice something.

Peering out the window of the doll house, you can see that you're not with Becca at all... it was another girl, a bit younger looking. This must've been the sister Becca was talking about. She'd come back for her dollhouse. What kind of teenager still uses a dollhouse? You try to get your bearing, leaning against the bed as the shaking of the house begins to subside. You must be in Sara's room now, you figure. The house comes to rest in your new environment, and you cautiously crawl to the window again, looking out. Suddenly, you stop yourself. For the time being, she doesn't know you're here. Maybe that was for the best.
1153232.title: Moving Day

choices: Sara absent-mindedly wiggles her toes from your tickle and you slip between them
She feels a slight irritant on her foot, shaking you off, thinking you're a bug
11532321.content:
There was no sense in just waiting around in the house. Becca might come looking for you eventually, but there was not telling when that would be. You feel the pangs of hunger gnawing at your insides. Although you weren't thrilled about the idea of cluing in another person about your tiny plight, it might be the only thing you can do. You were honestly starving at this point. How bad could Sara really be, if she was related to Becca? Her sister had only shown you kindness thus far, so would it really be so bad to take this leap of faith in trust a family member? Your stomached responded with another growl. Contact it was!

You stroll out the front door with skipping a beat, finding Sara just where you'd expected. The titanic girl loomed above you, staring down at her phone, her fingers dancing across the screen as she composed what you can only assume was one book of a text. You scanned the girl a bit as you approached her. Sara seemed pretty alternative, almost post-goth in her attire. She wore all black, all the way down to her bare feet, which were coated in chipped black nail polish. As much as you didn't deem it the safest place, those colossal feet were your only ticket to getting Sara's attention from the carpet.

Struggling to trudge your way through the denser carpet fibers of Sara's bedroom, you hoped this trek was worth it. With your luck, you knew something had to go wrong, but surely she'd feel a four inch man if her jumped up and down on her bare feet, right? There had to be a stroke of luck in her not having shoes on. Skin was easier to get noticed on than a shoe. You finally arrive at the massive altar of the goth girl's feet, and she was still typing away. Perfect. There'd be no variables then. You hoist yourself in the space between Sara's big toe and its neighbor, scrambling up with an agility you didn't know you possessed.
11532321.title: Enter Sara

choices: You landing in Sara's clothes hamper.  But were they clean, or dirty?
You landed on the floor near a door, unsure if it went to her closet or the hall
You landed in Sara's boot
115323212.content:
You take a second to inspect your new host. She was wearing black, fishnet leggings which would be an easy climb. Because of how she was sitting, you couldn't see anything past her knees, meaning you didn't know what to expect once you made your way up there. You started to make your way to her leg, which wouldn't take that long. You could easily get up somewhere she could see you in no time at all!

As you made your way across her foot, you felt a slight twitch. A voice above you boomed, "Fucking bugs, didn't you learn when you saw your friends?" Her tone wasn't exactly what you were hoping for. Instantly striking fear into your heart. Maybe you made a bad choice coming to her, you should have left to try and find Becca.

As soon as your regret hit its head, the foot twitched again. Then, your world flipped as you were sent soaring through the air. "Get the fuck out of here!" You heard Sara yell as you watched her and her room fly by you. You were about to pass out from flipping so much, making you dizzy and almost sick, when you hit something hard, then fell and landing somewhere soft. But where?
115323212.title: A soft, unknown landing

choices: Make a run for the hall, hoping you can find Becca's room before Sara catches up
Run back to the dollhouse instead, as you figure she won't think to look there
1153232122.content:
A haze fills your mind as you struggle to pick yourself up. Your brain had been addled in the collision with... whatever it was, and you were experiencing some double-vision, never mind some serious aching after your collision. As your vision begins to clear, you look around to see you were on another side of the room, but relatively unharmed considered the distance you'd traveled. You know you bounced off some something soft first, that broke the main impact of being flung by Sara, but it's unclear what that even was. Until now. To your left was a small pile of balled-up black socks, creating a small slope that led to where you were now. Evidently you'd landed on them, which explained why you were even still breathing. But the question was, where were you now?

You drag yourself to you feet, surveying the room. You could still see Sara looming in the distance, standing now, but back on her phone already. The difference now was that she was actually looking in your direction. A creeping realization began to fall over you: she was looking to confirm the kill. Evidently, Sara was not one to tolerate any pests in her room, and she was trying to make sure you were done for. The goth girl was making her way toward you, and your options were limited. Looking behind you, you see the slightly open door that you could only assume led back into the hallway. From there you could probably figure out the location of Becca's room and get to safety. That is, if her enormous sister didn't find you first. More booming footsteps. Sara was getting closer.
1153232122.title: Far Flung

choices: You make your way back to Becca's room
You make your way outside, you'd rather face that then stay here
You stay in the dollhouse and get some sleep, find help that night
11532321222.content:
You look for some place to hide. You see her boots, tossed onto the floor carelessly, a pile of clothes, and the dollhouse. You quickly run the options through your mind. The boots could be good, but what if she puts them on? The clothes might not be bad, but what if they are dirty and she does laundry? The only viable option looks to be the dollhouse, where this nightmare started.

You make a run for it, trying to hide behind objects as you do, in the hopes she wont see you, taking your time to take cover. You move to her desk, and hide behind the leg, peaking out to see where she was. You saw her, still coming towards you, still on her phone typing away. Was she even coming to find you?

Then, out of seemingly nowhere, you hear a loud ringing. You watch as Sara moves her phone up to her ear. "Yea? I know, I was about to get ready.....Yea, yea okay, just give me a minute. There was this huge bug on my foot, I'm trying to find it....Yea, Becca, Okay, I'll be down in a minute."

By the sounds of it, Becca wasn't even looking for you. Maybe she forgot about you. Whatever it was, it sounded like they were both leaving. This was the best chance you had to get back to Becca,which still seemed like the best idea. You notice Sara isn't leaving just yet, she still seems to be looking for you, scanning the floor as she walked around.

"Come on out, bug, I don't have time for this. I have to leave." She said, sounding pretty annoyed. You see an opening and run for the dollhouse. You get on the porch, and run up to the door, which was almost twice your height. You reach for the door handle, taking a quick glance behind you as you notice the booming steps of the giantess seemed to have stopped. You see she is looking in her boot, and you are relieved you didn't try for them.

You quickly get inside and run to the living room, planning to take shelter behind the couch. As soon as you get there, the booming begins again. You watch out the window as you see her long legs coming towards the dollhouse. She stopped a few feet away, and you could do nothing but watch and her knees bent and her hands placed themselves on the floor in front of you. Quickly, the rest of her gigantic, but somehow majestic form, filled the window, and all you could see was her. Her face was the next thing to show up, and you quickly hid behind the couch before she could see you.

Feeling like the predator had found its prey, you heard her breathing, which only proved to terrify you more. You could feel your heart beating out of control, and along with your predators breathing, created an annoyingly accurate soundtrack of your current situation.

"Come out, come out, where ever you are." She sang, taunting you, scaring you. You stayed where you were, knowing full well you wouldn't like what would happen should she find you. "Alright, fine, play that way. I'll find you when i get back. But I'm going to be angrier then, and I'm going to have a lot more fun with you." You heard her stand up, and her booming steps started to get farther away.

You took a peak outside, just to make sure she was gone, and to your pleasant surprise, she was. Once you decided it was safe, you walked back to the dollhouse door, scared to open it. What should your next plan be?
11532321222.title: Shelter from a giant terror

choices: Sara picks up the dollhouse, inspecting the inside for the bug
Sara goes to lie down on her bed, and you plot your escape
115323212223.content:
You need to take a break from this constant nightmare for a while. This whole ordeal with Becca and her sister has been extremely taxing on you, both mentally and physically. The unfortunate truth was that your judgment had become clouded by fatigue and fear. You needed time to resettle and rest. Only then could you strike out again to find help. With Sara gone, you could rest without the creeping anxiety that she might return to finish the job.

Trudging back to your bedroom, you climb up to the bed, noting that you hadn't gotten any smaller since the last time you were here, at least. With any luck, the miniaturization had tapered off. You wonder if it would wear off completely eventually, restoring you to normal size on your own. If so, being in this dollhouse might prove to be a little painful. You doubt you'd be getting off so easily, though. No, you'd need the assistance of a normal-sized person to regrow.

The sleep was much needed. You couldn't have been out more than a few hours, though, before the now-familiar thud of footsteps rouses you from your slumber. Rushing to the window, you find just what you had expected: Sara was back. An enormous foot stomps down in front of the window, revealing the fishnet-clad leg of your giant tormentor. Did she know you were in here? Thoughts whiz around in your brain and you ponder what to do.
115323212223.title: Night Falls

choices: You make your way to the door, just barely able to slip under it
You make your way to the door but Sara gets up to leave, you hide
Sara wasn't asleep yet and sees you trying to sneak your way out
1153232122232.content:
You helplessly watched from the dollhouse as the legs of your unknowing captor stopped and watched as they moved slightly while she turned to look at the dollhouse. Far above you, you heard her say "I doubt it's in there still, I'll look for it tomorrow." before she started to walk back towards her bed. A large, black, shadow fell over the dollhouse as it was covered by a cloth. Looking back at you through the window was a large skull, grinning at you with a sinister expression. She must have thrown her shirt onto the dollhouse.

In the distance, you heard the creak of her bed as she climbed into it. For you, everything was dark. You had no idea what was going on exactly out there. For all you knew she was lying in bed asleep, or getting ready to. You knew you had to do something, find some way back to Becca. But how? Sara closed her door on her way in, you might be able to slide under the door, but it might be a tight fit. You give yourself a few minutes to make sure the titan wont rise again before you head out.
1153232122232.title: In the dark, dark night

choices: You manage to free yourself, rolling out of the way just in time
You are crushed under Sara's foot, and she wipes you off before returning to bed
11532321222323.content:
You tiptoe out of the dollhouse door, scanning the area at ground level. The air is filled with Sara's rhythmic breathing. Good. The thinner carpet fibers of Sara's bedroom floor don't offer nearly as much resistance as Becca's, so you start heading for the door at a pretty swift pace. The massive door extends almost beyond your line of sight, almost mythical in scale. Briefly, you entertain the idea that this is what the gate to heaven would be like.

But your thoughts of heaven were not to last. Shattering your reverie is the sound of the monolithic goth girl rising from her bed, her heels slamming against the floor as she slides out of bed. The thunderous footfalls are like earthquake tremors, sending you sprawling face-first into the carpet fibers.
"You thought I wouldn't see you slip out, huh, little bug? Well, I can't sleep at night knowing I have gross, uninvited guests crawling around," Sara booms.

You immediately pick yourself up, not skipping a beat, but you don't dare to look back. The image of Sara bearing down upon you is already forming in your mind as you run, the horror of it quickening your heart rate. A surge of adrenaline accompanies your fear, however, and you begin to cover more ground than expected. In fact, you are almost to the giant door. The hallway, and your freedom, extends beyond. Meanwhile, Sara's giant footsteps continue to thud behind you.

"Gotcha now, bug! Did you really think you could outrun me?" Sara mocks, giggling in a way that made your heart sink. She was upon you. Another tremor sends you tumbling to the floor yet again, the underside of the door still at least a hundred yard (for you) off in the distance. You break your rule and jerk your head around, only to find the colossal bare feet of the giant girl filling your view. Sara flicks on the light. She knew right where you were!

A shadow falls over you in the dim light as her right foot rises into the air, a pale white sole eclipsing the artifical light of the room that now spilled over you. You try to get up, but you've become tangled in the damned carpet fibers, and in your panicked state you can't figure out how to free yourself.
"Well, well, well. There you are, you little fucking pest. Say hello to foot!" Sara says dryly, her sole continue to descend toward your helpless form.
11532321222323.title: Sara Plays Dead

choices: Door 1, Becca's room
Door 2, Becca's Parents room
Door 3, the bathroom
115323212223231.content:
You struggle against the fibers you fight your way out of the trap you found yourself in. The shadow of Sara's foot looms over you, getting closer and closer to you. She was moving it slowly, she wanted you to suffer. It was right on top of you, you could feel the change in the air, you could reach out and touch it should you want to.

Just as you can feel the heat radiating off Sara's weapon of choice, your leg breaks free! You roll out of the way just in time, and break out into a run towards the door. By the time you reach it, Sara notices you're gone.

"You crafty little shit," You hear behind you, booming as loud as ever. "I'll fucking find you! You can't run!" But you did.

You finally make it through the door, and find yourself in the hallway. You knew you didn't have much time to make a choice, and there were 3 doors to choose from. What to you choose?
115323212223231.title: Tuck and roll

choices: You opt to hide behind a pair of shower flip-flops right by you at ground level
You choose to hide in a low cabinet under the sink that is slightly ajar
1153232122232313.content:
As much as you wanted to head for Becca's room, there were a couple of big reasons not to. For one thing, Becca didn't even seem to give a shit that you were gone. Surely she must've noticed the dollhouse had vanished by now, and would've come to investigate. No, there was something more going on... you're beginning to wonder if she was somehow a part of this. Nothing seemed to add up about this whole situation.

The other reason was that the bathroom is the closest door to you, and by the sound of the lumbering footfalls of the giga goth behind you, you really had to take any port in a storm. This particular port just happened to be the nearest. With any luck there would be a good selection of hiding places. You feel a sudden surge of adrenaline course through your veins, spurring you onward in your desperate dash for the bathroom door.

It was open just a crack. More luck. What the hell was going on? Things weren't supposed to line up for you. You hear Sara's door swing open, letting light stream into the darkened hallway. Fuck. She would be on your heels in a matter of seconds. Fortunately for you, the bathroom door was just ahead. You hit a maximum speed as you make your beeline for the opening into the bathroom, twisting to slip through at a speed you didn't know you could even reach.

The cold tile now stretched before you, and you didn't have much time to scan your surroundings for adequate cover, but you had to hurry.
"Do you really think I don't know you're in there, bug?" Sara's voice descends from on high. "Ready or not, here I come!"
Sweat forms on your forehead as your eyes dart around the huge bathroom. If you didn't find somewhere to hide right now, you were as good as dead.
1153232122232313.title: Escape To The Bathroom

choices: Sara looks inside the cabinet and moves the items around to find you
Sara doesn't think to look in the cabinet
11532321222323132.content:
Knowing there would be more places to hide in the cabinet, you opt to go in there. You run over to it, thankfully you weren't too far away. Getting to the door, you realise it won't be as easy as you had hoped it would. There was a gap underneath that wouldn't help you climb up.

You jump up and grab onto the bottom of the cabinet frame. You hang there, struggling to pull yourself up, as you hear the roaring steps of your giant tormentor coming ever closer. At what felt like the last second, you manage to lift yourself up and into the cabinet. You look around, and you were right, there were plenty of things to hide behind. Knowing you didn't have much time, you ran to the back and his behind the bottle of bleach just as Sara opened the bathroom door and turned on the light.

"Alright you fucking bug," you heard her boom from outside. "Where the hell did you go?"
11532321222323132.title: A jar is always an opening

choices: Desperately try to reveal to her that you're human, not a bug
Play dead and hope she thinks the bleach's fumes killed you.
115323212223231321.content:
Sara's threatening words continue to assault your tiny eardrums are you shift in place behind the bleach, nervous as all hell. Why was she so hellbent on killing what she believed to be a bug? You would have thought she'd give up the chase the first time you slipped out of sight. Who is this intent on killing a bug? Unless there was something more to it... you aren't exactly one for crackpot conspiracy theories, but something about this just didn't add up.

You hear more pounding footsteps and a shadow casts over the small crack of light coming in from the open cabinet door. Sara was getting warmer. Fuck. You hunker down behind the bleach, praying she didn't think to actually start pulling things out in an effort to find you. Unfortunately, God wasn't in at the moment. The cabinet door swings open violently. A couple spray bottles of Windex were pulled out, and your layer of protection grows thinner.

Unfortunately for you, your were as far back in the cabinet as you could go. As more and more items were being taken out, it was only a matter of seconds before Sara would remove your cover, the bleach bottle. You wrack your brain, desperate for a solution. No matter what it took, you could not end up at the mercy of this goth goddess. As your mind races, the last bathroom item before your cover was removed. You had to act now!
115323212223231321.title: End Of The Line

choices: Becca comes to take a shower, maybe you should get her attention
Sara comes back, deciding to add you to her collection and torture your carcass
Someone new comes in, another sister?
1153232122232313212.content:
Thinking on your feet with what little resources you had, which was none honestly, you threw yourself on the ground, hoping to seem like you were dead. A loud screech followed as the giant bottle of bleach you were hiding behind was moved by the giga goths hand. You slightly opened an eye to get a look at her, staring back at you as a smile crept over her face.

"There you are, you little shit." She boomed from the doorway. You saw her hand coming towards you, her tree trunk sized fingers reaching for you before they wrapped around you, forcefully grabbing you and bringing her to her billboard sized face. You let your body fall limp, hoping that she would think your dead and you would be home free.

Her face came closer, at a speed you could barely handle. You maintained your composure, knowing this was your only chance. When she brought you to her face, you saw her evil smile change to a saddened, but still terrifying, frown. "Well, shit. Looks like the bleach did the job for me," She boomed, directly in front of you, almost deafening you. "You're a weird looking bug, and big too. Gross.
